## Step 1: Create the index.html page

First, to learn about merge conflicts, we gotta make one!

### âŒ¨ï¸ Activity

1. Copy and paste this into index.html:
   ```
   <!DOCTYPE html>
   <html>
   <body>
   <h1>My First Heading</h1>
   <p>My first paragraph.</p>
   </body>
   </html>
   ```
